user_add: Add New Task to the List.
user_check: Check Completed Tasks and Delete it.
the_glimpse:
A simple and smart Daily Tasks List that Helps you focus on your day. 
Daily Tasks is a simple, smart to-do list that makes it easy to plan your day. 
 Whether it's for work, school or home, Daily Tasks will help you increase your productivity and reduce your stress levels.  
It combines smart technology and beautiful design to make your day's workflow simple.  
Organize and plan your day Organize your day with smart suggestions from Daily Tasks and complete the most important tasks and chores you need to get done every day.
